titleStmt.title: A table of the additions and alterations made in the second edition of the Animadversions upon Dr. Sherlock's book of the Trinity
titleStmt.author: South, Robert, 1634-1716.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Intended to accompany: South, Robert. Animadversions upon Dr. Sherlock's book entituled A vindication of the holy and ever-blessed trinity &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
